General.Name: Zhejiang Semir Garment Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Semir Garment Co., Ltd. produces and sells casual apparel and children's apparel products in China and internationally. The company provides clothing, shoes, hats, and knitted and home textile products. It offers its products under the Semir, Balabala, Makale, Mini Bala, AIKEN, PUMAKIDS, SEMIR PLUS, Asics KIDS, Juicy Couture, Jason Wu, Hey Junior, and Marc O'Polo brands. The company provides its products through online and offline omni-channel retail systems, including specialty stores, supermarkets, department stores, shopping malls, outlets, e-commerce, and mini programs. Zhejiang Semir Garment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 2689, Lianhua South Road, Shanghai, China, 201109
